name: AERNNOVA
membership:
TEDAE: Aerospace, Defense and Space Industries Association in Spain
ASD: Aerospace, Space and Defense Association
goal:
Aernnova is a Leading Aerostructures Tier -1 Company focused on the Design and Manufacturing of Major Aerostructures .
Specialized in Wings (Central and Outer Main Torque Boxes, Flaps, Ailerons and Spoilers), Empennages (Vertical, Horizontal Stabilizers, Ruder and Elevators) and Rear Fuselages for Civil and Military Aircraft.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Politica eduropea de transporte. En particular aviación.
Politica europea de I+D
Política europea de apoyo a innovación
